casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Terry Cherelle GRAY, Jr. & Charles Hezekiah Gilchrist, Jr. No. COA15-500. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Feb. 2, 2016.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

No Error in Aisbi and Burglary Convictions and Sentences; Vacate Sentences for MM and Remand for Resentencing; Vacate Defendant Gilchrist?s Felonious CCW Judgment, Enter Judgment on Misdemeanor CCW and Resentence; IAC Claim Denied.
